toast.sent_arena_description_fighter: has been selected as the fighter
toast.sent_arena_description_opponent: has been selected as the opponent

mondex.failed_fetch: Couldn't load data from MonkeyAPI. Maybe CORS isnt disabled in Browser or MonkeyAPI isnt running on localhost?

monkeyapi.description: Here you can interact with the MonkeyAPI. Remember that this needs the API running in the background on http://localhost:8080 and CORS must be disabled in browser. Otherwise the communication with the backend will fail

image.label: Image
image.description: A URL to a image from which the image of the monkey can be downloaded

description.label: Description
description.description: (Optional) Description or trivia about the monkey

species_name.label: Species name
species_name.description: (Optional) Name of the species to which the monkey belongs

known_from.label: Known from
known_from.description: (Optional) From where (movie, game etc.) the monkey is known

strength.label: Strength
strength.description: (Optional) Which are the strenghts of the monkey? (Can be descriptive)

weaknesses.label: Weaknesses
weaknesses.description: (Optional) Which are the weaknesses of the monkey? (Can be descriptive)

hp.description: Health points of the monkey. Used when battleing in arena

attack.description: Attack of the monkey. Used when battleing in arena

defense.description: Defense of the monkey. Used when battleing in arena

special_attack.description: Special attack of the monkey. Used when battleing in arena

special_defense.description: Special defense of the monkey. Used when battleing in arena

speed.description: Speed of the monkey. Used when battleing in arena

form.api_error_message: Couldn't create Monkey. Does the monkey already exist?

mon.name: Name must be given
mon.description: Description can only have up to 300 characters

special_attack.int: Special Attack must be an integer
special_attack.gt: Special Attack must be greater than 0
special_attack.lt: Special Attack can't be greater than 500

special_defense.int: Special Defense must be an integer
special_defense.gt: Special Defense must be greater than 0
special_defense.lt: Special Defense can't be greater than 500
